title.rendered: INTECH is the proud winner of HIMA Partner Award for Middle East for outstanding contribution towards business growth in 2020

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]INTECH takes central spot on the podium as it proudly wins “The Best HIMA Partner in Middle East Region for outstanding contribution towards growing HIMA Smart Safety application business in 2020”.

Rehan Ahmad, HIMA’s Chief Operating Officer for Middle East, awarded the coveted honor to Huseyn Tarek, INTECH’s Senior Vice President for Middle East & Africa, at a ceremony held in Taj Hotel, Dubai earlier this month. The attendees included Vivek Jain (Regional Sales Manager) and Brad Ogilvie (Sales Director) from HIMA and Hisham Teggaz (Business Development Director), Ahmed Raza (Country Manager) and Sheikh Shahid Javed (Sales Director GCC) from INTECH.

HIMA, the world’s leading independent provider of industrial smart safety solutions, launched the Middle East Partner Awards to recognize the contribution of its system integrators in strategically growing safety solution business in the region. INTECH Process Automation, a renowned system integrator and automation solution provider for the Oil & Gas sector globally, won the award as ‘The Best HIMA Partner in Middle East Region’ for outstanding contribution towards growing HIMA Smart Safety application business in 2020.

Commenting on INTECH’s performance, Brad Ogilvie applauded INTECH for extending their capabilities to go beyond the basic definition of a system integrator. “INTECH are not only system integrators, but are a total solutions-consultant for their customers”, he said, “INTECH’s performance has been outstanding”.

Huseyn Tarek acknowledged HIMA’s team and products for a phenomenal customer experience. “HIMA’s team has been instrumental in getting us closer to the customer and getting the high level of performance that we are expecting to provide to our customers”, he said, “Without your partnership it would not have been possible. Customers are very happy with the experience that they are getting from HIMA products”.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]With over 16 years of collaboration INTECH and HIMA have worked together on several critical safety projects for largest international companies globally. INTECH and HIMA are working closely to provide safety and security solutions to the customers in strategic geographical regions like Africa and CIS.

Despite the difficulties that the year 2020 brought to the world, INTECH continues to repay the trust of its technology partners and clients with sustained business growth for them. Moreover, its own business presence in the Middle East, Africa, and CIS is gaining renewed strength with a host of automation technologies and digital solutions, gradually shifting from a project-based solution provider to a partnership-based solution provider. INTECH is working closely with its technology and platform partners as well as clients to build long-term relationships for combined efforts towards solving problems and providing solutions that are cost-efficient, time-efficient, and bring the best of what everyone can offer.

About HIMA

The HIMA Group is the world’s leading independent provider of smart safety solutions for industrial applications. With more than 35,000 installed TÜV-certified safety systems worldwide, HIMA qualifies as the technology leader in this sector. Its expert engineers develop customized solutions that help increase safety, cyber security and profitability of plants and factories in the digital age. For over 45 years, HIMA has been a trusted partner to the world’s largest oil, gas, chemical, and energy-producing companies. These rely on HIMA solutions, services and consultancy for uninterrupted plant operation and protection of assets, people and the environment. HIMA’s offering includes smart safety solutions that help increase safety and uptime by turning data into business-relevant information. HIMA also provides comprehensive solutions for the efficient control and monitoring of turbomachinery (TMC), burners and boilers (BMC) and pipelines (PMC). In the global rail industry, HIMA’s CENELEC-certified SIL4 COTS safety controllers are leading the way to increased safety, security and profitability. Founded in 1908, the family-owned company operates from over 50 locations worldwide with its headquarters in Bruehl, Germany. With a workforce of approximately 800 employees, HIMA generated a turnover of approximately €123 million in 2017.

For more information, please visit: www.hima.com

About INTECH

INTECH Process Automation is a globally renowned system integrator and industrial automation company. For nearly 30 years we have helped major oil & gas companies solve their most pressing issues of instrumentation, control, and electrical automation. INTECH’s diversiﬁed automation solution portfolio, technical skills, knowledge, and expertise on equipment from all major OEMs, and our asset-application speciﬁc approach to solution design are what differentiates us from a typical system integrator.

As the world moves towards Industry 4.0, we move along with it and since late 2016, we have focused on building up our expertise on Industrial IoT and related digitalization solutions. We are gradually shifting from a project-based solution provider to a partnership-based solution provider. We have started working closely with our technology and platform partners as well as clients to build long-term relationships where we work together to solve problems and provide solutions that are cost-efficient, time-efficient, and bring the best of what everyone can offer.

For more information, please visit: www.intechww.com

How we are responding to COVID 19: We are ensuring that our services and business agreements are executed to the satisfaction of our clients and partners without exposing anyone to COVID 19. Our factories are operational with significant new safety measures. We have devised a global COVID 19 plan that covers international movement, precautions, behavioral changes, and contingency & emergency response options for all our business regions.

If you are an INTECH client and have not received information about our business continuity plans, please feel free to reach out to an INTECH account manager or project manager.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
